___fieldType.description: The type of field to add.

___internalName.description: Optional attribute. If provided, specifies the internal name of the field. If not provided, the internal name will be based on the display name

___isRequired.description: Whether this field is required to contain information.

___displayName.description: The display name of the field.

___enforceUnique.description: Optional attribute that defaults to false. If true, then all values for this field must be unique.

___addToDefaultView.description: Optional attribute that defaults to false. If true, the newly added field will also be added to the default view.

___name.description: The name of the ContentType to add.

___viewFields.description: An array of the internal names of the fields of the view.

___query.description: A CAML query string that contains the where clause for the view's query. See https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms462365

___scope.description: Optional. The scope of the view. See https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/microsoft.sharepoint.spviewscope.aspx

___formatterJSON.description: A JSON object to use as the view CustomFormatter.

___rowLimit.description: The row limit of the view.

___makeDefault.description: If true, the view will be made the default view of the list.

___sortOrder.description: A number specifying the sort order. See https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/microsoft.sharepoint.spregionalsettings.collation.aspx

___locale.description: A number specifying the culture by lcid. See https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms912047(v=winembedded.10).aspx

___hourFormat.description: Specifies whether the site should use 12-hour or 24-hour time.

___timeZone.description: A number specifying the time zone. See https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.sharepoint.spregionalsettings.timezones.aspx

___location.description: If this extension creates commands, where the commands are display. Otherwise, this should be set to ClientSideExtension.ApplicationCustomizer.

___registrationId.description: This is an optional parameter, which indicates the type of the list to which extension is associated, if the extension is associated with lists.

___scope.description: Indicates whether the extension is associated with a Web or a Site.

___clientSideComponentProperties.description: This is an optional parameter, which can be used to provide properties for the instance.

___registrationType.description: This is an optional parameter, which should be specified if the extension is associated with a list.

___themeName.description: The name of the theme to apply.

___isParentUrlWebRelative.description: Optional parameter. Indicates whether parentUrl is web-relative. The default is false.

___parentUrl.description: Optional parameter. If provided, makes this nav link a child of the nav link with this url. If both this and parentDisplayName are provided, it searches for a link that matches both to be the parent.

___url.description: The url of the link to add.

___displayName.description: The display name of the link

___parentDisplayName.description: Optional parameter. If provided, makes this nav link a child of the nav link with this displayName. If both this and parentUrl are provided, it searches for a link that matches both to be the parent.

___isWebRelative.description: Optionally indicates whether the link is web-relative. The default is false.

___url.description: The trigger URL of the Flow.

___parameters.description: An option set of parameters to pass into the Flow.

___waitForReply.description: If true, the script will expect that the Flow will call Microsoft.SharePoint.Utilities.SiteScriptUtility.SetSiteScriptStageOutcome() when it has finished executing. Note that this will not cause the script to block. The script will keep executing, but for record-keeping purposes, the run will be considered incomplete until the reply is made.
